description.zh-cn: 中国革命家、政治家、军事家和理论家，中国共产党、中华人民共和国和中国人民解放军的主要缔造者和领导人。曾任中央人民政府主席和中华人民共和国主席，是中华人民共和国的第一代最高领导人。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary who was the founder of the People's Republic of China (PRC), which he led as the chairman of the Chinese Communist Party from its establishment in 1949 until his death in 1976.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国主席。在文化大革命期间遭到政治迫害，被罢免所有职务并含冤去世。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary, politician, and theorist. He was Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee from 1954 to 1959, Vice Chairman of the Chinese Communist Party from 1956 to 1966, and President of the People's Republic of China from 1959 to 1968, during which he implemented policies of economic reconstruction in China.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家和政治家，中国人民解放军的创始人和主要领导人之一。曾任中华人民共和国副主席和全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: A Chinese general, warlord, politician, revolutionary of the Chinese Communist Party. He was a founder of the People's Liberation Army and served as its commander-in-chief.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，孙中山的夫人。曾任中央人民政府副主席、中华人民共和国副主席，并代行国家元首职权。被授予中华人民共和国名誉主席称号。
description.en: A Chinese political figure. As the third wife of Sun Yat-sen, one of the leaders of the 1911 revolution that established the Republic of China, she was often referred to as Madame Sun Yat-sen. She served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China and acted as head of state.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，中国共产党的创始人之一。曾任中华人民共和国副主席，并在刘少奇被罢免后担任代理主席。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary and politician, who served as the vice president of the People's Republic of China and acting president.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家和政治家，中华人民共和国元帅。在粉碎“四人帮”中扮演关键角色，后担任全国人大常委会委员长，行使国家元首职权。
description.en: A Chinese communist revolutionary, general, and politician. He was a key figure in the overthrow of the Gang of Four and later served as Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，1982年宪法恢复国家主席后，担任首任中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: A Chinese Communist military and political leader, President of the People's Republic of China from 1983 to 1988.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国主席。他是唯一一位非中共中央政治局常委担任的国家主席。
description.en: A Chinese Communist military and political leader, President of the People's Republic of China from 1988 to 1993.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席，是中华人民共和国第三代中央领导集体的核心。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party from 1989 to 2002, as Chairman of the Central Military Commission from 1989 to 2004, and as President of the People's Republic of China from 1993 to 2003.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席，是中华人民共和国第四代中央领导集体的核心。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party from 2002 to 2012, President of the People's Republic of China from 2003 to 2013, and Chairman of the Central Military Commission from 2004 to 2012.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，现任中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席、中央军委主席，是中华人民共和国第五代中央领导集体的核心。
description.en: A Chinese politician who has been the general secretary of the Chinese Communist Party and chairman of the Central Military Commission since 2012, and the president of the People's Republic of China since 2013.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立初期的国家元首机构，实行委员会制集体领导。
description.en: The head of state body in the early years of the People's Republic of China, which practiced a collective leadership system.

nodes.id: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会

zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会
en: Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的最高国家权力机关的常设机关。在1975年至1983年间，集体代行国家元首职权。
description.en: The permanent body of the National People's Congress, the highest organ of state power in the People's Republic of China. It collectively exercised the functions of the head of state from 1975 to 1983.

description.zh-cn: 由毛泽东发起和领导的政治运动，对中国的政治、经济和社会造成了深远的影响。
description.en: A political movement initiated and led by Mao Zedong, which had a profound impact on China's politics, economy, and society.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家、外交家，曾任中央人民政府政务院总理和中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese statesman, diplomat, and revolutionary who served as the first Premier of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，毛泽东逝世后的中华人民共和国最高领导人，曾任中共中央主席、国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Chairman of the Chinese Communist Party and Premier of the People's Republic of China. He was the paramount leader of China after Mao Zedong's death.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家、军事家和外交家，中华人民共和国第二代中央领导集体的核心，被誉为中国“改革开放的总设计师”。
description.en: A Chinese revolutionary leader, paramount leader of China from December 1978 to November 1989. After Mao Zedong's death in 1976, Deng gradually rose to supreme power and led China through a series of far-reaching market-economy reforms.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理和中国共产党中央委员会总书记。
description.en: A high-ranking statesman in China. He was the third Premier of the People's Republic of China from 1980 to 1987, and General Secretary of the Chinese Communist Party from 1987 to 1989.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理和全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the fourth Premier of the People's Republic of China from 1987 to 1998, and as the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress from 1998 to 2003.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A retired Chinese politician who served as the fifth Premier of the People's Republic of China from 1998 to 2003.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A retired Chinese politician who served as the sixth Premier of the People's Republic of China from 2003 to 2013.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the seventh premier of the People's Republic of China from 2013 to 2023.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，现任中华人民共和国国务院总理。
description.en: A Chinese politician who is the current premier of the People's Republic of China, since March 2023.

description.zh-cn: 中国军事家、政治家，曾任中华人民共和国中央人民政府副主席。
description.en: A Chinese military officer and politician.

description.zh-cn: 中国教育家、政治家，曾任中华人民共和国中央人民政府副主席。
description.en: A Chinese educator and politician.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国中央人民政府副主席。
description.en: A Chinese Communist Party leader.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，蒙古族。曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: A Mongol politician in the People's Republic of China, who served as Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: A Chinese political and military figure, who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国企业家、政治家，被誉为“红色资本家”，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician and businessman, who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: A retired Chinese politician, who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: A retired Chinese politician, who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，曾任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician, who served as Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治家，现任中华人民共和国副主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician serving as the current Vice President of the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 中华人民共和国最高领导人

zh-cn: 中华人民共和国最高领导人
en: Paramount leader of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治中拥有最高权力的领导人，通常是中国共产党的核心。
description.en: The most powerful political leader in the People's Republic of China, usually the core of the Chinese Communist Party.

position.en: Chairman of the Central People's Government

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东担任中央人民政府委员会主席，该委员会是当时的集体国家元首。
description.en: Mao Zedong served as the Chairman of the Central People's Government Council, which was the collective head of state at the time.

position.en: President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东担任第一届中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: Mao Zedong served as the first President of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国最高领导人

position.en: President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东担任最高领导人期间，刘少奇担任国家主席。
description.en: Liu Shaoqi served as President while Mao Zedong was the paramount leader.

description.zh-cn: 文化大革命期间，刘少奇被指为“叛徒、内奸、工贼”，并被违宪罢免党内外一切职务，最终被迫害致死。
description.en: During the Cultural Revolution, Liu Shaoqi was labeled a 'traitor, renegade, and scab,' unconstitutionally removed from all his posts, and persecuted to death.

position.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国代理主席
position.en: Acting President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 在刘少奇被罢免后，董必武作为副主席先与宋庆龄共同代行主席职权，后以代理主席名义行使职权。
description.en: After Liu Shaoqi's removal, Dong Biwu, as Vice President, initially exercised presidential powers jointly with Song Qingling, and later acted as Acting President.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东担任最高领导人期间，董必武代行国家主席职权。
description.en: Dong Biwu acted as head of state while Mao Zedong was the paramount leader.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东担任最高领导人期间，宋庆龄作为副主席与董必武共同代行国家主席职权。
description.en: Song Qingling, as Vice President, jointly exercised presidential powers with Dong Biwu while Mao Zedong was the paramount leader.

position.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长
position.en: Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 国家主席职务被废除后，全国人大常委会集体担任国家元首，朱德作为委员长是其代表。
description.en: After the presidency was abolished, the NPC Standing Committee collectively served as the head of state, with Chairman Zhu De as its representative.

description.zh-cn: 在毛泽东担任最高领导人期间，朱德担任全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: Zhu De served as Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee while Mao Zedong was the paramount leader.

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国最高领导人

position.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会代理委员长
position.en: Acting Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 朱德逝世后，宋庆龄以副委员长身份代理委员长，代行国家元首职权。
description.en: After Zhu De's death, Song Qingling, as Vice Chairwoman, acted as Chairwoman and exercised the functions of the head of state.

description.zh-cn: 在华国锋担任最高领导人期间，宋庆龄代行国家元首职权。
description.en: Song Qingling acted as head of state while Hua Guofeng was the paramount leader.

position.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会常务委员会委员长
position.en: Chairman of the Standing Committee of the National People's Congress

relationships.target: 中华人民共和国最高领导人

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平担任最高领导人期间，叶剑英担任全国人大常委会委员长。
description.en: Ye Jianying served as Chairman of the NPC Standing Committee while Deng Xiaoping was the paramount leader.

description.zh-cn: 叶剑英邀请邓小平重新出山接任最高领导人。
description.en: Ye Jianying invited Deng Xiaoping to return to power and take over as the paramount leader.

position.en: President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平担任最高领导人期间，李先念担任国家主席。
description.en: Li Xiannian served as President while Deng Xiaoping was the paramount leader.

position.en: President of the People's Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 在邓小平担任最高领导人期间，杨尚昆担任国家主席。
description.en: Yang Shangkun served as President while Deng Xiaoping was the paramount leader.

position.en: President of the People's Republic of China

position.en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

position.en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China

position.en: Vice President of the People's Republic of China
